charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was on a stroll
one day...
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1101_0200_:
when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Steven amongst the hustle and
bustle of the town square.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_0300_:
Hmm... Maybe I should just go out and search for
meteorites instead...
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0402_0700_:
Oh, hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t think I’d run into you today.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_0800_: I was just doing a bit of thinking.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_0900_:
Did you know that Rayquaza can Mega Evolve
without using a Mega Stone? It’s part of what
drew me to forming a sync pair with mine.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_1000_:
But I’ve still barely scratched the surface when
it comes to learning about its Mega Evolution.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0301_1100_:
Do you know any experts that
could help?
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0401_1200_:
Hmm... There is one person I know who’s studied
Mega Evolution.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0302_1300_: I wouldn’t know where to start.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0402_1400_:
Yes, I am in a bit of a pickle. If only I could find
someone well-versed in the subject.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_1500_:
Morning, you two! Do you need help with
anything? You look a little troubled.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_1700_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and I were just
talking about Rayquaza’s Mega Evolution.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_1800_:
You wouldn’t happen to know why it’s able
to Mega Evolve without the power of a Mega
Stone, would you?
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_1900_: Ahh... Curious about Rayquaza, are you?
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_2000_:
Well, theoretically, Mega Evolution should only be
possible through the use of two special stones by
a Trainer and Pokémon who share a strong bond.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_2100_:
But it would seem that Rayquaza, a super-ancient
Pokémon, requires a different sort of power to
accomplish this.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_2300_:
We do have evidence that Rayquaza have eaten
meteorites in the Hoenn region.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_2400_: What do you think that could mean?
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0301_2500_:
It uses meteorites as an
energy source?
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0401_2600_:
Precisely. I believe that’s the correct conclusion
as well.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0402_2800_:
*chuckle* I’m not sure about that. But I do think it
may be able to use meteorites as some kind of
energy source.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_2900_:
Ah, sorry, Rayquaza. You must be getting bored
of all this science talk.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_3000_:
There’s still so much I don’t understand
about you...
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_3100_:
but as for what you’re feeling right now, I think
I may have a hunch.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_3200_:
“Enough talk. Let’s have a battle already.”
...Am I right?
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_3300_:
Hey, you don’t have time for a quick battle with
us, do you?
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_3400_:
Theorizing is great, but battling is still the best
way I know to understand a Pokémon better!
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0401_3600_: I had a feeling you’d be on board!
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_0402_3900_:
I don’t know how much longer Rayquaza can
contain itself with such formidable opponents
right in front of it.
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_4000_:
If it’s a battle you’re after, I’m more than happy
to participate. Give us everything you’ve got!
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_4200_:
In that case... [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s time to battle!
charaepi_ch0090_50_daigo/2301_1201_4300_:
Let’s make it crystal clear which one of us is
the strongest!
